d <- cbind(X1 = runif(3), X2 = 10^c(3, 5, 7), X3 = rnorm(3,
  0, 1000))
# at most 4 decimal places
knitr::kable(d, digits = 4)

    X2 
    X3

             format.args = list(scientific = FALSE))
